name: Cats and Coins
description:
Information

Cats and Coins is a retro-styled platform game with non-linear levels in which you have to collect all coins to unlock the exit.
The game includes a mode to make your own levels!

NOTE: The game has been tested in Chrome, Firefox and Edge. Let me know if you encounter major issues in a different web browser. On rare occasions the loading at the beginning of the game gets stuck (it's an itch.io issue), just refresh the page and try again.

Controls Menus
  • Arrow keys: Change selection
  • C key: Accept/continue
  • X key: Cancel/back
Play Mode
  • Left and right arrow keys: Move player
  • Down arrow key: Crouch
  • C: Jump (also against walls when wearing the boots and down platforms when crouching)
  • X: Shoot (when wearing the collar)
  • Enter: Show/hide pause menu
  • Space: Show all collected coins
Edit Mode
  • Arrow keys: Move cursor
  • C: Place tile/object
  • X: Remove tile/object
  • Enter: Show/hide pause menu
  • Space: Show/hide tool selection screen

The game can also be played with a gamepad. In case of an Xbox 360 controller the Arrow keys, C, X, Enter and Space will be mapped to Analog/D-pad, A, B/X, Start and Back respectively. Other controllers will work but might be mapped differently.

Credits

Design, programming, graphics and music by Siegfried Croes

Tools used: Custom-made JavaScript engine, Aseprite and LSDj
